column1: Question,Correct Answer,Wrong Answer 1,Wrong Answer 2,Wrong Answer 3
Which class reads bytes from a file?,FileInputStream,FileReader,BufferedReader,Scanner

Which method reads a line from console?
Console console = System.console();,console.readLine(),console.read(),console.nextLine(),console.getLine()
Which interface must a class implement to be serializable?,Serializable,Externalizable,Cloneable,Comparable
Which class provides buffered character input?,BufferedReader,FileReader,InputStreamReader,Scanner
Which method creates a new file?,Files.createFile(path),Files.newFile(path),Files.create(path),new File(path)
Which method writes bytes to a file?,FileOutputStream.write(),FileWriter.write(),PrintWriter.write(),BufferedWriter.write()
Which keyword prevents field serialization?,transient,volatile,static,final
Which class reads text from character input stream?,InputStreamReader,FileInputStream,BufferedInputStream,ByteArrayInputStream

What is the result?
Files.delete(Path.of("test.txt"));,File deleted or NoSuchFileException,Always succeeds,Compilation error,Returns boolean
Which method reads all lines from a file?,Files.readAllLines(path),Files.read(path),Files.getLines(path),Files.readLines(path)

What is the output?
Path path = Path.of("file.txt").toAbsolutePath();,Absolute path to file.txt,file.txt,Compilation error,null
Which method checks if path is a directory?,Files.isDirectory(path),path.isDirectory(),Files.isFolder(path),path.isFolder()
Which class is used for reading primitive types?,DataInputStream,FileInputStream,ObjectInputStream,BufferedInputStream

What happens with Files.move()?
Files.move(Path.of("old.txt"), Path.of("new.txt"));,File moved/renamed,Compilation error,File copied,Returns boolean
Which method creates directories?,Files.createDirectories(path),Files.createDirectory(path),Both A and B,Files.mkdir(path)

What is the result?
Files.write(Path.of("test.txt"), List.of("Line1", "Line2"));,File contains Line1 and Line2,Compilation error,Only Line1 written,Cannot write List
Which method traverses directory tree?,Files.walk(path),Files.traverse(path),Files.list(path),Files.tree(path)

What happens with Files.list()?
Files.list(Path.of("docs"))
    .forEach(System.out::println);,Prints immediate children only,Prints all descendants,Compilation error,Returns List
Which creates a Path object in Java 11+?,Path.of(""file.txt""),Paths.get(""file.txt""),Both A and B,new Path(""file.txt"")

What is the result?
Files.createFile(Path.of("test.txt"));,File created or FileAlreadyExistsException,Always succeeds,Compilation error,Returns boolean
